Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI is able to provide without time restriction, summaries of ideas or topics of interest, however this doesn't mean that the summary is accurate as it does not provide reference lists.  Lecturers/ teachers will be able to recall where they found data and reference it.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: As mentioned above, AI is fast but the accuracy can't be determined. Teachers have a time constraint (as no one should be healthy dealing with only their job) but can provide personalised feedback.
